name: Chrome Native Client Executable
summary: Learn about .NEXE files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: NEXE files are often used by game developers when porting their code so that their games can be run within a Chrome extension. Some games listed in the Chrome Web Store use native executables.
NOTE: The Native Client project is an open source effort that provides the Native Client Software Development Kit (SDK) for creating NEXE files.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
